item.title: Earning Shareback: 10 Golden Do’s and Don’ts
item.description: Missing a purchase from your dashboard? Contact customer support to raise a claim Become an expert in earning WeShares WeShop has built a powerful platform that connects directly with retailers, making sure every purchase you make appears in your dashboard.

item.title: WeShop: Changelog 04/04/2022
item.description: Quick Intro What an incredible few weeks it’s been… and say hello to our first ever changelog post on WeShop. The engineers at WeShop have been working hard to make the WeShop dream a reality.

item.title: Welcome to WeShop
item.description: WeShop is a revolutionary social commerce platform coming soon which is truly social and truly commercial. Buy, share, earn We believe people do listen to their friends and family when making purchasing decisions.
